com.apperian.javautil

Class Fields

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.apperian.javautil.Fields

  • final class Fields
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for retrieving information about a Field object.
    Author:
    Kevin LaFlamme

      Fields()

    • Method Detail

      • getField

        static java.lang.Object getField(java.lang.Object obj,
                        java.lang.reflect.Field field)
                          throws UnsupportedTypeException
        Gets field field on obj

        This will retrieve field using obj as this. obj should be a {Class if field is static

        Parameters:
        obj - The object to retrieve the field from
        field - The Field object to retrieve
        Returns:
        Returns the return value of the field on obj
        Throws:
        UnsupportedTypeException

      • setField

        static void setField(java.lang.Object obj,
            java.lang.reflect.Field field,
            java.lang.Object value)
              throws UnsupportedTypeException,
                     java.lang.ClassCastException
        Sets field field on obj to value

        This will set field to value using obj as this. obj should be a {Class if field is static

        Parameters:
        obj - The object to retrieve the field from
        field - The Field object to retrieve
        value - The value to set
        Throws:
        UnsupportedTypeException
        java.lang.ClassCastException

      • getSignature

        static java.lang.String getSignature(java.lang.reflect.Field field)
        Gets the field signature for a particular Field

        This method returns the internal method signature for a Method object. This signature can be used to retrieve the jmethodID via JNI

        Parameters:
        field - The Field object used to retrieve the signature
        Returns:
        A String representing the method signature
